item.title: Arrows Con Polo
item.description:
30 minutes | 4 servings

Ingredients[^0] link

  • 4 tbsp olive oil
  • 3 chicken breasts
  • 2 tsp salt
  • 1/4 tsp black pepper
  • 1 chopped onion
  • 1 chopped green pepper
  • 1 chopped red pepper
  • 3 tsp garlic powder
  • 2 cups rice
  • 2 tsp cumin
  • 2.5 cups hot water

Steps link

  1. cook chicken in a pan till ready
  2. cook peppers and onions in a pan till ready
  3. cook rice in instant pot (add chicken and peppers and onions to instant pot)

I like chili lime seasoning with it

item.title: Babe Ruth Bars
item.description:
15 minutes | 12 servings

Ingredients link

  • 1 cup sugar

  • 1 cup corn syrup

  • 1.5 cup peanut butter

  • 4 cup rice crispies

  • 1 cup chocolate chips

  • 1 cup butterscotch chips

Steps link

  1. bring to a boil the sugar and corn syrup

    • I think you have to cook it slowly or else it burns and the rice crispies are built like bricks

  2. add peanut butter and rice crispies

  3. press into 9x13 pan

item.title: Korean ground Beef
item.description:
20 mins | 4 servings

Ingredients link

  • 2 lb ground beef
  • 4 tsp Garlic Powder
  • 2 cups (spanish) rice

Flavoring link

  • 1 tbsp ginger
  • 2 tsp sesame oil
  • 1/2 cup soy sauce
  • 1/3 cup (light) brown
  • sugar
  • 1/4 tsp crushed red
  • pepper
  • 2 (green / yellow)
  • onions
  1. cook rice in instant pot
  2. put ground beef in pan and cook till brown
  3. mix flavorings and add to pan

item.title: Peanut Butter Pie
item.description:
20 minutes | 6 servings

Ingredients link

  • .5 cup peanut butter
  • .5 cup powdered sugar
  • 1 block cream cheese
  • 1 container cool whip
  • 1 graham cracker crust

Steps link

  1. throw in bowl and blend it
  2. refrigerate it

item.title: White Chicken Chili
item.description:
8 people (1 cup servings)

Ingredients link

  • 2 large chicken breasts
  • 15 oz can black beans, drained and rinsed
  • 15 oz can white beans, drained
  • 1 medium onion, chopped
  • 15 oz can corn with juice
  • 10 oz can rotel diced tomatoes with gree nchilis (with juice)
  • 1/2 cup chicken broth or stock
  • 1 tsp chili powder
  • 1 tsp cumin powder
  • 0.4 oz packet ranch dip / dressing mix1

optional toppings link

  • 1/2 cup chopped cilantro
